Title: Crypt Ghast Courtier
Legend: Hissing captains of the mordants, Crypt Ghast Courtiers move among the pale ranks of the king’s army to direct the cannibal formations. They drive more Ghouls into the fray, while seeking out gruesome trophies to bestow upon their ‘men’.
Intro: BATTALIONSThis warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Ghoul Patrol • King’s Ghouls • Mortevell’s Helcourt

Rules.Rule: DESCRIPTIONA Crypt Ghast Courtier is a single model armed with a Bone Club and Filthy Claws.

Rules.Name: Muster Serfs
Rules.Fluff: With a cry, the courtier calls forth more of the Ghoul King’s lowest minions.
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES In your hero phase, roll 6 dice for each friendly CRYPT GHAST COURTIER on the battlefield. For each 2+ you can return 1 slain model to a friendly SERFS unit that is within 10" of that CRYPT GHAST COURTIER. Slain models can be returned to more than one unit if you wish, but each successful dice roll can only be used to return a model to a single unit.

Rules.Name: Trophy Hunter
Rules.Fluff: Crypt Ghast Courtiers inspire their followers by holding aloft trophies torn from the bodies of their slain foes.
Rules.Rule: If any enemy models are slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks, until the end of the phase in which the attacks were made add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly SERFS units while they are wholly within 16" of this model.
